thread.title: 'X Factor' Final 12 Are Revealed, But Who Should Win The 2015 Series? Vote In Our Poll...
thread.title_full: 'X Factor' Final 12 Are Revealed, But Who Should Win The 2015 Series? Vote In Our Poll...

author: Ashley Percival
title: 'X Factor' Final 12 Are Revealed, But Who Should Win The 2015 Series? Vote In Our Poll...
text:
Previous Story Next Story 'X Factor' Final 12 Are Revealed, But Who Should Win The 2015 Series? Vote In Our Poll... The Huffington Post UK | By Ashley Percival 
After months of scouring the country for the best undiscovered talent, the ' X Factor ' judges have finally revealed who has made it through to the live shows . READ MORE: Cheryl Has A Change Of Heart About Controversial 'X Factor' Finalist 
The final 12 were unveiled over two nights of special Judges Houses' episodes on Saturday and Sunday (24, 25 October), with Simon Cowell , Cheryl Fernandez-Versini , Rita Ora and Nick Grimshaw revealing their choices live to the nation. 
And with the line-up now in place, the competition is about to really heat up, as the contestants get ready to sing their hearts out week after week on the famous 'X Factor' stage, in the hope of securing the public's vote. 
The bookies seem to think that Louisa Johnson has already got the series all sewn up, with William Hill listing her as 9/4 favourite to win the show, just ahead of 4th Impact at 9/2 and Che Chesterman at 5/1. 
But who is your early favourite to win the competition? Have your say in our poll below... 
The X Factor continues on Saturday (31 October) at 8pm on ITV. Close
